name: Solitaire Tripeaks:World Tour
description:
Do you play Classic Solitaire,Tripeaks, Klondike, Pyramid, FreeCell, Spider Solitaire or other card games? Try Solitaire TriPeaks! Solitaire fans and card game fans will love the free games of TriPeaks Solitaire(also known as Tri Towers, Triple Peaks,Solitaire Tri Peaks,Solitaire Blitz,Castle Solitaire-tripeaks,Solitaire Cube ,Farm Adventure,Solitaire Cruise,Tiki Solitaire，harvest Solitaire or Three Peaks)!

Why do 10 million users love this solitaire game? Solitaire TriPeaks Journey is as satisfying as it is challenging, combining traditional Klondike card games with unique twists and unexpected features.
Say goodbye to boredom and misery with tri-peaks solitaire games. Want to enjoy a rich life and a world of entertainment from your mobile device playing tri peaks solitaire free?
Download 《Solitaire tripeaks world tour》 now and enjoy awesome features:

Endless Levels & Challenging Layouts
More than 5000+ free solitaire levels with puzzling layouts! Feel like a Solitaire Master as you outsmart the game with tactics and wit! Unlike traditional Solitaire games, tons of special cards are added to spice up the action and to elevate your game to greater heights!

Dynamic Graphics & Surreal Scenery Themes
Stuck at home and tired of the vacation blues? Don't sweat it because this Solitaire TriPeaks adventure will cure all your symptoms! Dive in and discover the most beautiful gems in this solitaire world. Las Vegas, London, Tokyo, or Amazon, there's a place that'll satisfy your heart's desire, so pack your bags and start your Solitaire vacation now!

Hidden Surprises & Awesome Bonuses
More than you can ever imagine! Get goodies from the Lucky Wheel, and bonus Treasures! Make your way through the Solitaire levels to discover more hidden gems and rewards!

Special Cards & Unique Gameplay
It takes skills, tactics, patience, and wit to win this solitaire game! Give your brain a real workout by using all kinds of strategies as the levels get more challenging along the way. Don’t hesitate to take your solitaire card games to the next level!
 
Home Design & decoration
Show your amazing decoration skills and transform the garden, hall, bedroom, study and more scenes of the Manor! Match the style of the manor with thousands of options in your mind!

Play to your heart's content with both offline and online solitaire game modes. Enjoy your Solitaire card games without ever worrying about an internet connection. Not sure if there's a place you want to visit? We'll take you around the globe and you can discover your hidden gem!

Tired of playing the same type of solitaire card games all the time? 《Solitaire tripeaks world tour》 is the best new solitaire card game with unique gameplay and a constantly growing world of levels and spectacular locations.

The Solitaire thrill just never stops! Download this game and start your adventure of a lifetime now!
